mapper.insert: insert into CAS_USER ( USER_ID, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_LV_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, FREEZE, ISTHERE, THIRDID, SALT, ENCRYPT, TEL, PHONE, VERIFIEDPHONE, EMAIL, VERIFIEDEMAIL, NICKNAME, REALNAME, IDCARD, GENDER, AVATAR, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NO, CHANNELID, STATUS, IS_VERIFY, IS_DEL, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_IP, BAN_ETIME, CTIME, MTIME, TELPHONE, NUMBEREGRAL, SIGNATURE, TYPE, HEADPORTRAITPATH, MOBILE, THIRDLOGNUMBERYPE, ISRECYCLE, CREATORID, MODIFIERID, ACCOUNT, ISFREEZE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, STORE_ID, IS_HAVE_STORE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY )values ( #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userGroupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{userLvId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{freeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isthere,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thirdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifiedphone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifiedemail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isVerify,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banEtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numberegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{headportraitpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdlognumberype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isrecycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isfreeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isHaveStore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update CAS_USER
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_GROUP_ID = #{userGroupId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USER_LV_ID = #{userLvId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREEZE = #{freeze,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISTHERE = #{isthere,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIRDID = #{thirdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENCRYPT = #{encrypt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERIFIEDPHONE = #{verifiedphone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERIFIEDEMAIL = #{verifiedemail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IDCARD = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GENDER = #{gender,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AVATAR = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_NO = #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNELID = #{channelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_VERIFY = #{isVerify,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_IP = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BAN_ETIME = #{banEtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CTIME = #{ctime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MTIME = #{mtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TELPHONE = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUMBEREGRAL = #{numberegral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HEADPORTRAITPATH = #{headportraitpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRDLOGNUMBERYPE = #{thirdlognumberype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISRECYCLE = #{isrecycle,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATORID = #{creatorid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MODIFIERID = #{modifierid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISFREEZE = #{isfreeze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_HAVE_STORE = #{isHaveStore,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_ID=#{userId}
update CAS_USER SET is_del = 1 where 1=1 and USER_ID=#{userId}
mapper.select: select USER_ID, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_LV_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, FREEZE, ISTHERE, THIRDID, SALT, ENCRYPT, TEL, PHONE, VERIFIEDPHONE, EMAIL, VERIFIEDEMAIL, NICKNAME, REALNAME, IDCARD, GENDER, AVATAR, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NO, CHANNELID, STATUS, IS_VERIFY, IS_DEL, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_IP, BAN_ETIME, CTIME, MTIME, TELPHONE, NUMBEREGRAL, SIGNATURE, TYPE, HEADPORTRAITPATH, MOBILE, THIRDLOGNUMBERYPE, ISRECYCLE, CREATORID, MODIFIERID, ACCOUNT, ISFREEZE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, STORE_ID, IS_HAVE_STORE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY from CAS_USER where USER_ID=#{userId}

select USER_ID, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_LV_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, FREEZE, ISTHERE, THIRDID, SALT, ENCRYPT, TEL, PHONE, VERIFIEDPHONE, EMAIL, VERIFIEDEMAIL, NICKNAME, REALNAME, IDCARD, GENDER, AVATAR, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NO, CHANNELID, STATUS, IS_VERIFY, IS_DEL, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_IP, BAN_ETIME, CTIME, MTIME, TELPHONE, NUMBEREGRAL, SIGNATURE, TYPE, HEADPORTRAITPATH, MOBILE, THIRDLOGNUMBERYPE, ISRECYCLE, CREATORID, MODIFIERID, ACCOUNT, ISFREEZE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, STORE_ID, IS_HAVE_STORE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY from CAS_USER where USER_ID=#{userId}

select * from( select * from ( select USER_ID, USER_GROUP_ID, USER_LV_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, FREEZE, ISTHERE, THIRDID, SALT, ENCRYPT, TEL, PHONE, VERIFIEDPHONE, EMAIL, VERIFIEDEMAIL, NICKNAME, REALNAME, IDCARD, GENDER, AVATAR, DEVICE_TYPE, DEVICE_NO, CHANNELID, STATUS, IS_VERIFY, IS_DEL, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_IP, BAN_ETIME, CTIME, MTIME, TELPHONE, NUMBEREGRAL, SIGNATURE, TYPE, HEADPORTRAITPATH, MOBILE, THIRDLOGNUMBERYPE, ISRECYCLE, CREATORID, MODIFIERID, ACCOUNT, ISFREEZE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, STORE_ID, IS_HAVE_STORE, ADDRESS, BIRTHDAY, rownum r
) where r <= #{offset}+#{rows} ) where r > #{offset}
